coreOffering.whatItDoes: Relay is a group-based program designed to help people overcome pornography addiction and other compulsive/unwanted sexual behaviors
coreOffering.problemSolved: Pornography addiction and compulsive sexual behavior - helping people quit porn and find 'lasting freedom'
coreOffering.howItWorks: Group-based approach combining daily encouragement, real accountability partnerships, and a supportive community environment

targetAudience.idealCustomer: Individuals struggling with pornography addiction or compulsive sexual behavior who want structured support and accountability
painPoints: Struggling to quit porn on their own
Failed attempts at stopping compulsive sexual behavior
Need for daily encouragement and support
Desire for lasting change rather than temporary fixes

features.name: Group-Based Program
features.description: Users are placed in groups with others on similar recovery journeys
features.benefit: Reduces isolation, creates peer support and shared accountability

features.name: Daily Encouragement
features.benefit: Maintains momentum and keeps users engaged in their recovery

features.name: Real Accountability
features.description: Accountability partnerships and tracking within the group structure
features.benefit: Creates external motivation and commitment to recovery goals

features.name: Supportive Community
features.description: Access to a community of people with similar goals
features.benefit: Provides understanding, reduces shame, and offers peer support

features.name: Private Newsletter
features.description: Weekly tips and inspiration delivered via email
features.benefit: Ongoing education and motivation outside the main program

features.name: Therapist Integration
features.description: Dedicated resources and pathway for therapists to refer clients
features.benefit: Professional endorsement and clinical integration option

valueProposition.mainUvp: The #1 group-based program to overcome compulsive sexual behavior - emphasizing that 'change is possible'
sellingPoints: Quit porn for good - lasting freedom (not temporary)

pricing.notes: Pricing page returned 404 error - pricing information not publicly available on main pages

toneAndVoice.style: Warm, supportive, hopeful, and non-judgmental. Uses healing/recovery language rather than clinical terminology. Emphasizes possibility and readiness to help.
notablePhrases: Quit porn for goodâ€” find lasting freedom
Change is possible. We're ready to help.

secondary: Join the private newsletter for weekly tips and inspiration

additionalInsights.limitationsOfAnalysis: Main page content is minimal/repetitive. Pricing page returned 404. Testimonials, detailed features, and How it Works content not captured in provided scrape. Would need deeper site crawl to extract full details.
